name: Run a Café
description:
Run a Café is a game where you do just that, run a Café!

Make drinks from regular coffee, to iced flavored coffees and even serve food!
Manage your inventory and time efficiently to ensure you maximize every customer!
Start from nothing and build a full scale, dine-in Café! Keep an eye on your money and your Café ratings!
Too low of ratings or running out of money causes you to close up shop and it's game over!
